content.text:
# 12th Golden Raspberry Awards

The 12th Golden Raspberry Awards were held on March 29, 1992, at the Hollywood Roosevelt Hotel to recognize the worst the movie industry had to offer in 1991.
Awards and nominations
File:Kevin Costner 2016.jpg|Kevin Costner, Worst Actor winner.
File:Sean Young LF.JPG|Sean Young, Worst Actress and Worst Supporting Actress winner.
File:Dan Aykroyd cropped.jpg|Dan Aykroyd, Worst Supporting Actor winner.
File:Dan Waters.jpg|Daniel Waters, Worst Screenplay co-winner.
File:Bruce Willis by Gage Skidmore.jpg|Bruce Willis, Worst Screenplay co-winner.
File:Vanilla Ice.jpg|Vanilla Ice, Worst New Star winner.
File:MC Hammer (cropped).jpg|MC Hammer, Worst Original Song co-winner.
